mainSequence.step: User A initiates a transaction on the Polkadot Ledger through the API Client.
API Client sends a request to the API Server.
API Server forwards the transaction request to the Polkadot Ledger Connector.
Polkadot Ledger Connector executes the transaction using the transact() method.
Polkadot Ledger Connector sends the response back to the API Server.
API Server sends the formatted response back to the API Client.
